predicate.note: Frames file for 'self-destruct' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: one example is enough
example.text: Morton Downey Jr., who [*T*-1] self-destructed as a talk-show host and frequently verbally abused his guests, has been signed to co-host a half-hour nightly program on the Consumer News and Business Channel, the cable channel partly owned by the General Electric Co.'s National Broadcasting Co.
